description:
Frenzy 21: It's like Blackjack on crack.

The goal is to clear each column by reaching 21 without "busting", or exceeding 21.  If you bust, the column is locked and you cannot place any cards there unless you have unlocks available (use your unlocks by tapping the locked column).  With a mere 60 seconds per round and a full deck of cards to navigate through, you'll have to hurry!

Extra unlocks are earned by rapidly clearing columns and also given by certain mystery cards.  

When a round is successfully completed, four mystery cards will appear.  You can receive extra time for the next round and additional unlocks, but watch out for the whammy cards which will reduce the amount of time you get to complete the next round.

It's a race against the clock to beat the high score! 

Good luck!
